justification: “After the experimental block, participants explicitly rated each of the 6 agents (from 1-7) on how trustworthy they believed the agents to be (Trust)…”

measured_by: single-item 7-point Approachability rating scale (1 = low, 7 = high)
justification: The paper states that after gameplay “participants explicitly rated each of the 6 agents (from 1-7) on how readily they would approach each agent (Approachability).”

measured_by: face-morph continuum images ranging from 0 % human / 100 % robot to 100 % human in 20 % increments
justification: “Morphing software was used to create the spectrum from 100 % robotic (i.e., 0 % human) to 100 % human with 20 % increments. These faces constituted 6 agents whom participants interacted with throughout the experiment.”
